Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.393: And if he does, I'll kill him.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.394: Him, Ned Stark, the king - the whole bloody lot of them,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.395: until you and I are the only people left in this world.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.396: I wish I could see the girls.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.397: - It's too dangerous. - Just for a moment.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.398: Until we know who our enemies are.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.399: I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.4: Get the girls settled in. I'll be back in time for supper.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.40: Tell me, if I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.400: In my bones, I know it.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.402: I can't do anything without proof.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.403: And if you find the proof?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.404: Then I bring it to Robert...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.405: and hope he's still the man I once knew.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.406: You watch yourself on the road, huh?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.407: That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.409: Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.413: Yes, it's been a long time.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.414: But I still remember every face.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.42: You served him well... when serving was safe.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.424: Mine was some Tarly boy at the Battle of Summerhall.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.425: My horse took an arrow so I was on foot, slogging through the mud.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.426: He came running at me, this dumb high-born lad,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.427: thinking he could end the rebellion with a single swing of his sword.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.428: I knocked him down with the hammer.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.431: Probably shattered every rib he had.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.432: Stood over him, hammer in the air.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.433: Right before I brought it down he shouted, "Wait! Wait."
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.434: They never tell you how they all shit themselves.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.435: They don't put that part in the songs.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.437: Now the Tarlys bend the knee like everyone else.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.438: He could have lingered on the edge of the battle with the smart boys,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.439: and today his wife would be making him miserable,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.441: and he'd be waking three times in the night to piss into a bowl.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.443: Lancel. Gods, what a stupid name.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.445: Who named you? Some halfwit with a stutter?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.447: - It's empty, Your Grace. - What do you mean, it's empty?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.448: - There's no more wine. - Is that what empty means?!
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.45: I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.450: Tell your cousin to get in here.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.453: Every time I close my eyes I see their blond hair
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.455: It must wound your pride, huh?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.456: Standing out there like a glorified sentry.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.457: Jaime Lannister, son of the mighty Tywin...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.458: forced to mind the door while your king eats and drinks and shits and fucks.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.46: We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.461: Who was your first kill, not counting old men?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.462: One of the outlaws in the brotherhood.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.464: You were only a squire, 16 years old.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.465: You killed Simon Toyne with a counter riposte.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.467: A good fighter, Toyne, but he lacked stamina.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.47: A shame you didn't say a prayer for the butcher's son.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.470: - I cut his head off, so no. - Hmm.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.472: What did the Mad King say when you stabbed him in the back?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.474: Did he call you a traitor?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.475: Did he plead for a reprieve?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.476: He said the same thing he'd been saying for hours...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.479: Do the Dothraki buy their slaves?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.480: The Dothraki don't believe in money.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.481: Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.483: If you rule a city and you see the horde approaching, you have two choices -
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.486: Of course, sometimes it's not enough.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.487: Sometimes a khal feels insulted by the number of slaves he's given.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.488: He might think the men too weak or the women too ugly.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.489: Sometimes a khal decides his riders haven't had a good fight in months
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.49: And you look tired from the road.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.492: You want the entire horde to stop? For how long?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.494: You're learning to talk like a queen.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.498: You give commands to me? To me?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.499: You do not command the dragon. I am Lord of the Seven Kingdoms.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.5: - And, Jory, you go with them. - Yes, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.50: I told them this meeting could wait another day, but...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.500: I don't take orders from savages or their sluts. Do you hear me?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.501: Rakharo ask if you want him dead, Khaleesi.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.503: Rakharo say you should take ear, to teach respect.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.505: Tell him I don't want my brother harmed.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.509: Shall we return to the khalasar, Khaleesi?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.51: But we have a kingdom to look after.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.512: I wanted to be here when you saw it for the first time.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.513: - I'm leaving this morning. - You're leaving?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.516: - There have been disturbing reports. - What kind of reports?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.517: The kind I don't want to believe.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.518: I'm ready. I won't let you down.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.52: I've hoped to meet you for some time, Lord Stark.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.521: - But I'm better than every... - Better than no one!
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.523: a man gets what he earns,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.526: - A bear's balls. -  Oh, you're joking?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.527: And his brains and his guts, his lungs and his heart,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.528: all fried in his own fat.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.529: When you're a hundred miles north of the Wall
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.53: - No doubt Lady Catelyn has mentioned me. - She has, Lord Baelish.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.530: and you ate your last meal a week ago, you leave nothing for the wolves.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.531: And how do a bear's balls taste?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.533: And what about you, my lord? What's the strangest thing you've eaten?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.535: So... you roam the Seven Kingdoms, collaring pickpockets and horse thieves
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.536: and bring them here as eager recruits?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.538: But it's not all of 'em's done bad things.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.539: Some of 'em's just poor lads looking for steady feed.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.54: I understand you knew my brother Brandon as well.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.540: Some of 'em's high-born lads looking for glory.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.541: They have a better chance finding feed than glory.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.542: The Night's Watch is a joke to you, is it?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.543: Is that what we are, Lannister? An army of jesters in black?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.544: You don't have enough men to be an army
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.545: and, aside from Yoren here, none of you are particularly funny.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.546: I hope we've provided you with some good stories to tell
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.547: when you're back in King's Landing.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.548: It's something to think about while you're drinking your wine down there,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.55: All too well. I still carry a token of his esteem...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.550: Half the boys you've seen training will die north of the Wall.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.551: Might be a wildling's axe that gets them,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.556: so plump little lords like you can enjoy their summer afternoons in peace and comfort.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.558: - Listen, Benjen... May I call you Benjen? - Call me what you like.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.559: I'm not sure what I've done to offend you.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.560: I have great admiration for the Night's Watch.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.561: I've great admiration for you as First Ranger.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.562: You know, my brother once told me...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.563: that nothing someone says before the word "but" really counts.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.565: I don't believe that giants and ghouls and white walkers
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.567: I believe that the only difference between us and the wildlings
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.568: is that when that wall went up, our ancestors happened
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.569: to live on the right side of it.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.57: Perhaps you chose the wrong man to duel with.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.571: The wildlings are no different from us.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.573: But they're made of meat and bone.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.574: I know how to track them and I know how to kill them.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.575: It's not the wildlings giving me sleepless nights.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.576: You've never been north of the Wall, so don't tell me what's out there.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.578: - Keep well, keep warm. - Enjoy the capital, brother.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.58: It wasn't the man that I chose, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.580: I think he's starting to like me.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.582: Into the tunnel and out the other side.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.583: He'll be north of the Wall for a month or two.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.584: So... you're heading down to King's Landing too.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.586: I get about half of my recruits from their dungeons.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.587: Let's share the road. I could use some decent company.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.589: I travel a bit on the grubby side, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.590: Not this time. We'll be staying at the finest castles and inns.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.591: No one turns away a Lannister.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.594: When was last time you bleed, Khaleesi?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.596: It's a blessing from the Great Stallion
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.597: For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.599: It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.6: If you'd like to change into something more appropriate...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.60: A woman worth fighting for, I'm sure you'll agree.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.600: But a man in full plate...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.601: ...the arakh won't get through the steel.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.602: That's where the broadsword has the advantage.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.608: - Slow. - It's true, but it also keeps a man alive.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.609: My father taught me how to fight.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.61: I humbly beg your pardon, my Lord Stark.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.610: He taught me that speed defeats size.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.611: I've heard that your father was a famous warrior.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.612: He was bloodrider to Khal Bharbo.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.613: And your father, Jorah the Andal? He was a warrior also?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.617: The Khaleesi wants to eat something different tonight.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.620: Find some ducks, she likes ducks.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.621: Have you seen any ducks, woman? No rabbits, no ducks.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.622: Do you have eyes in your head? Do you?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.623: Dog then. I have seen many dogs.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.624: I don't think she wants to eat dog.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.625: The khaleesi have baby inside her.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.626: It is true. She does not bleed for two moons.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.628: A blessing from the Great Stallion.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.629: She does not want to eat horse.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.63: How many years has it been?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.630: I'll have the boys butcher a goat for supper.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.631: I need to ride to Qohor.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.632: Uh, we ride for Vaes Dothrak.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.635: Don't stand so still. It's harder to hit a moving target.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.636: Except for you. You move too much.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.637: I could just hold my sword out and let you do the work for me.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.638: How many winters have you seen, Lord Tyrion?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.64: - You were a young man. - And you served another king.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.641: They say the winter of my birth was three years long, Maester Aemon.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.643: But reports from the citadel tell us the days grow shorter.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.644: The Starks are always right eventually -
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.647: and dark things will come with it.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.648: We've been capturing wildlings, more every month.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.650: The ones who flee... say they've seen the white walkers.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.651: Yes, and the fishermen of Lannisport say they see mermaids.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.652: One of our own rangers swore he saw them kill his companions.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.653: He swore it right up to the moment Ned Stark chopped his head off.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.654: The Night's Watch is the only thing standing between the realm
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.656: And it has become an army of undisciplined boys and tired old men.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.657: There are less than a thousand of us now.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.658: We can't man the other castles on the Wall.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.659: We can't properly patrol the wilderness.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.660: We've barely enough resources to keep our lads armed and fed.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.661: Your sister sits by the side of the king.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.663: When winter does come, gods help us all if we're not ready.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.667: I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.668: It's either me or this cold,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.669: and it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.670: Will you stop at Winterfell on your way south?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.672: Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.673: If you see my brother Bran,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.675: Tell him I'd visit if I could.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.678: If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.68: - Without the king? - Winter may be coming,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.682: Tomorrow you will be here at midday.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.687: That is not the way, boy.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.688: It is not a greatsword that is needing two hands to swing it.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.689: - It's too heavy. - It is heavy as it needs to be
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.69: but I'm afraid the same cannot be said for my brother.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.692: One hand is all that is needed.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.693: Now you are standing all wrong.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.697: You are skinny. That is good.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.699: Now the grip - let me see.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.7: Thank the gods you're here, Stark.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.703: The steel must be part of your arm.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.704: Can you drop part of your arm? No.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.705: Nine years Syrio Forel was first sword to the Sealord of Braavos.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.706: He knows these things. You must listen to me, boy.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.708: Boy, girl... You are a sword, that is all.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.71: He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.710: You are not holding a battle-axe. You are holding...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.714: Now we will begin the dance.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.716: this is not the dance of the Westeros we are learning...
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.717: The knight's dance, hacking and hammering.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.72: We are the lords of small matters here.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.722: All men are made of water.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.725: the water leaks out and they die.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.726: Now you will try to strike me.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.73: My brother instructs us to stage a tournament
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.74: in honour of Lord Stark's appointment as Hand of the King.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.75: - Mm, how much? - 40,000 gold dragons to the champion,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.78: Can the treasury bear such expense?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.79: I'll have to borrow it. The Lannisters will accommodate, I expect.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.8: About time we had some stern northern leadership.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.80: We already owe Lord Tywin three million gold. What's another 80,000?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.81: Are you telling me the Crown is three million in debt?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.82: - I'm telling you the Crown is six million in debt. - How could you let this happen?
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.83: The master of coin finds the money. The king and the Hand spend it.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.84: I will not believe Jon Arryn allowed Robert to bankrupt the realm.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.85: Lord Arryn gave wise and prudent advice,
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.86: but I fear His Grace doesn't always listen.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.89: This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.9: Glad to see you're protecting the throne.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.90: As you will. But still, we'd best make our plans.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.91: There will be no plans... until I speak to Robert.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.93: - I had a long ride. - You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.96: - It's ugly. - A king should have scars.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.97: You fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.98: I'm not like him. I didn't fight off anything. It bit me and all I did was scream.
Game Of Thrones S01E03 Lord Snow.srt.99: And the two Stark girls saw it, both of them.

Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.1: The little lord's been dreaming again.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.10: - Hodor? - Help Bran down the hall.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.100: We're done for today. Go clean the armoury.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.103: - Did he hurt you? - I've had worse.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.104: You can call me Sam... if you want.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.105: - My mother calls me Sam. - It's not going to get any easier, you know?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.106: - You're going to have to defend yourself. - Why didn't you get up and fight?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.110: - My father always says so. - The Wall's no place for cowards.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.112: I just... wanted to thank you.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.114: People saw us talking to him. Now they'll think we're cowards too.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.115: You're too stupid to be a coward.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.116: - You're too stupid to be a... - Quick now,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.12: I must say I received a slightly warmer welcome on my last visit.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.120: Vaes Dothrak - the city of the horselords.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.121: A pile of mud. Mud and shit and twigs.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.122: - Best these savages can do. - These are my people now.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.123: - You shouldn't call them savages. - I'll call them what I like,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.124: because they're my people. This is my army.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.125: Khal Drogo is marching the wrong way with my army.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.126: If my brother was given an army of Dothraki,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.127: could you conquer the Seven Kingdoms?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.128: The Dothraki have never crossed the narrow sea.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.129: They fear any water their horses can't drink.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.13: Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.131: King Robert is fool enough to meet them in open battle,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.132: but the men advising him are different.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.133: - And you know these men? - I fought beside them once,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.135: Now Ned Stark wants my head.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.136: He drove me from my land.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.14: Any man of the Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.145: They call you the last dragon...
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.147: You have dragon's blood in your veins?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.150: I was told that brave men killed them all.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.151: The brave men didn't kill dragons.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.153: Rode them from Valyria to build the greatest civilization
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.155: The breath of the greatest dragon forged the Iron Throne,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.156: which the Usurper is keeping warm for me.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.159: melted together like so many candles.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.16: I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.160: I have always wanted to see a dragon.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.161: There's nothing in the world that I would rather see.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.164: And wherever they are, just a few flaps of their wings
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.168: Anyone or anything that tries to hurt them
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.17: Then you might learn a lord's courtesy.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.173: Yes. Seeing a dragon would make me very happy.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.174: Well, after 15 years in a pleasure house,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.175: I imagine just seeing the sky makes you happy.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.176: I was not locked in. I have seen things.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.177: - What have you seen? - I've seen...
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.178: a man from Asshai with a dagger of real dragonglass.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.179: - Ooh. - I've seen a man who could
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.180: change his face the way that other men change their clothes.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.181: And I've seen a pirate who wore his weight in gold
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.182: and whose ship had sails of coloured silk.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.187: No, the last one died many years before I was born.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.188: I'll tell you what I have seen -
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.190: They used to decorate the throne room in the Red Keep.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.191: When I was very young, just three or four,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.192: my father used to walk me down the rows
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.193: and I'd recite their names for him.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.194: When I got them all right, he'd give me a sweet.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.195: The ones closest to the door were the last ones they were able to hatch
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.196: and they were all stunted and wrong with skulls no bigger than dog skulls.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.197: But... But as you got closer to the Iron Throne...
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.2: - We have visitors. - I don't want to see anyone.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.20: Do you remember anything about what happened?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.21: He has no memory of that day.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.212: The Usurper had them smashed to powder, I expect.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.214: - That's very sad. - Yes, it is.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.215: What did I buy you for?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.216: - To make me sad? - No, Your Grace.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.218: To teach my sister how to be a better lover?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.219: You think I bought you to make Khal Drogo happy?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.221: Go on, then. Get on with it.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.222: Someday your husband will sit there and you will sit by his side.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.223: And one day, before too long, you will present your son to the court.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.224: All the lords of Westeros will gather here to see the little prince.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.225: - What if I have a girl? - Gods be good,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.226: you'll have boys and girls and plenty of them.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.227: What if I only have girls?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.229: Jeyne Poole's mother had five children - all of them girls.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.23: Would your charming companion be so kind as to kneel?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.232: Well, if you only had girls,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.233: I suppose the throne would pass to Prince Joffrey's little brother.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.237: Why would you say such a thing?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.238: That business with the wolves? Sansa...
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.239: I've told you a hundred times -
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.24: - My neck is beginning to hurt. - Kneel, Hodor.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.240: - a direwolf is not... - Please shut up about it.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.242: - Who built the Iron Throne? - Aegon the Conqueror.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.243: - And who built the Red Keep? - Maegor the Cruel.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.244: And how many years did it take to build...
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.245: My grandfather and uncle were murdered here, weren't they?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.246: They were killed on the orders of King Aerys, yes.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.247: - The Mad King. - Commonly known as the Mad King.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.249: You should speak to your father about these matters.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.25: - Do you like to ride, Bran? - Yes.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.250: I don't want to speak to my father, ever.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.251: Sansa, you will find it in your heart
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.252: - to forgive your father. - No, I won't.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.253: It's the Hand's Tournament that's causing all this trouble, my lords.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.254: The King's Tournament. I assure you the Hand wants no part of it.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.255: Call it what you will, Lord Stark, ser,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.256: the city is packed with people and more flooding in every day.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.257: Last night we had a tavern riot, a brothel fire,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.258: three stabbings and a drunken horse race down the Street of Sisters.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.259: - Dreadful. - If you can't keep the king's peace,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.26: Well, I mean I did like to.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.260: perhaps the City Watch should be commanded by someone who can.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.261: - I need more men. -  You'll get 50.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.262: - Lord Baelish will see it paid for. - I will?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.263: You found money for a champion's purse, you can find money to keep the peace.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.264: I'll also give you 20 of my household guard
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.265: - till the crowds have left. - Thank you, my lord Hand, ser.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.266: They will be put to good use.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.267: The sooner this is over, the better.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.268: The realm prospers from such events, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.269: They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.27: - The boy has lost the use of his legs. - What of it?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.270: And every inn in the city is full
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.271: and the whores are walking bow-legged.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.272: I'm sure the tourney puts coins in many a pocket.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.274: if there's nothing else, my lords?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.276: On days like this, I envy you northerners,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.277: your summer snows. Until tomorrow, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.278: I've been hoping to talk to you about Jon Arryn.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.28: With the right horse and saddle, even a cripple can ride.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.280: Oh, his death was a great sadness to all of us.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.281: I took personal charge of his care, but I could not save him.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.282: His sickness struck him very hard and very fast.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.283: I saw him in my chambers just the night before he passed.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.284: - Lord Jon often came to me for counsel. - Why?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.285: I have been grand maester for many years.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.286: Kings and Hands have come to me for advice since...
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.287: What did Jon want the night before he died?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.288: Oh, he came inquiring after a book.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.29: - I'm not a cripple. - Then I'm not a dwarf.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.290: Oh, I fear it would be of little interest to you, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.292: No, I'd like to read it.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.294: of the Great Houses of the Seven Kingdoms,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.295: with descriptions of many high lords
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.298: Harkon Umber, first of his name,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.299: born to Lord Hother Umber and Lady Amaryllis Umber
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.3: Really? If I was cooped up all day
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.30: My father will rejoice to hear it.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.300: in the 183rd year after Aegon's landing,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.301: at the Last Hearth. Blue of eye, brown of hair
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.302: and fair complected, died in his 14th year
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.303: of a wound sustained in a bear hunt.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.304: As I said, my lord, a ponderous read.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.305: Did Jon Arryn tell you what he wanted with it?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.306: He did not, my lord. And I did not presume to ask.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.308: ...did he say anything to you during his final hours?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.31: I have a gift for you.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.310: Oh. There was one phrase he kept repeating.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.311: "The seed is strong," I think it was.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.314: the dying mind is a demented mind, Lord Stark.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.315: For all the weight they're given,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.316: last words are usually as significant as first words.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.317: And you're quite certain he died of a natural illness?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.32: Give that to your saddler. He'll provide the rest.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.320: No, no, no, I don't think it likely.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.321: The Hand was loved by all. What sort of man would dare...
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.322: I've heard it said that poison is a woman's weapon.

Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.327: How that sort of person found himself
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.328: - on the king's council, I will never know. - I've taken enough of your time.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.329: No trouble at all, my lord. It's a great honour.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.33: You must shape the horse to the rider.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.331: I'll find my own way out.

Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.335: - Tomorrow I'm going to be chasing cats. - Cats? Syrio says.

Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.337: They're as quiet as shadows and as light as feathers.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.338: - You have to be quick to catch them. - He's right about that.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.339: Now that Bran's awake, will he come live with us?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.34: Start with a yearling and teach it to respond to the reins and to the boy's voice.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.340: Well, he needs to get his strength back first.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.341: He wants to be a knight of the Kingsguard.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.342: - He can't be one now, can he? - No.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.343: But someday he could be lord of a holdfast
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.344: or sit on the king's council.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.345: Or he might raise castles like Brandon the Builder.

Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.347: You will marry a high lord and rule his castle.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.348: And your sons shall be knights and princes and lords.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.35: - Will I really be able to ride? - You will.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.352: Ser Alliser said I'm to be your new watch partner.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.354: I don't see all that well.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.356: - It's warmer. - No, that's all right. I'm fine.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.359: You can't fight. You can't see.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.36: On horseback you will be as tall as any of them.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.360: You're afraid of heights and almost everything else probably.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.361: What are you doing here, Sam?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.362: On the morning of my 18th nameday, my father came to me.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.363: "You're almost a man now," he said.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.364: "But you're not worthy of my land and title.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.365: "Tomorrow, you're going to take the black,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.366: "forsake all claim to your inheritance and start north.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.369: "and somewhere in these woods your horse will stumble
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.37: Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.370: "and you'll be thrown from your saddle to die.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.373: Ser Alliser's going to make me fight again tomorrow, isn't he?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.375: I'm not going to get any better, you know.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.378: I hear you're reading a boring book.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.38: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.380: - Pycelle talks too much. - Oh, he never stops.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.381: Do you know Ser Hugh of the Vale?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.383: Until recently, he was only a squire - Jon Arryn's squire.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.384: He was knighted almost immediately after his master's untimely death.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.386: - Why are you telling me this? - I promised Cat that I'd help you.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.388: - I'll speak to him. - A singularly bad idea.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.389: Do you see that boy there?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.39: You've done my brother a kindness.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.391: The spider has taken a great interest in your comings and goings.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.393: That one belongs to the queen.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.394: And do you see that septa pretending to read her book?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.395: - Varys or the queen? - No, she's one of mine.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.396: Is there someone in your service whom you trust completely?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.397: - Yes. - The wiser answer was no, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.398: Get a message to this paragon of yours - discreetly.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.399: Send him to question Ser Hugh.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.4: with no one but this old bat for company, I'd go mad.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.40: The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.400: After that, you might want him to visit a certain armourer in the city.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.401: He lives in a large house at the top of the Street of Steel.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.402: - Why? - I have my observers, as I said,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.403: and it's possible that they saw Lord Arryn
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.404: visit this armourer several times in the weeks before his death.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.405: Lord Baelish, perhaps I was wrong to distrust you.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.406: Distrusting me was the wisest thing you've done since you climbed off your horse.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.41: Spare me your false courtesies, Lord Stark. There's a brothel outside your walls.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.411: - Ser Hugh! - As you can see, I'm busy.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.412: I'm here on behalf of Lord Eddard Stark, the Hand of the King.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.413: - I'm the captain of his guard. - I'm sorry. I didn't catch your name, Ser...
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.414: - No "ser". I'm not a knight. - I see.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.415: Well, it just so happens that I am.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.416: He said he'd be glad to talk to the Hand himself.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.417: - He's a knight, you see. - Ah, a knight.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.418: They strut around like roosters down here.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.419: Even the ones who've never seen an arrow coming their way.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.42: There I'll find a bed and both of us can sleep easier.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.420: You shouldn't be out here, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.421: - There's no telling who has eyes where. - Let them look.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.422: The former Hand did call on me, my lord, several times.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.423: I regret to say he did not honour me with his patronage.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.424: - What did Lord Arryn want? - He always came to see the boy.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.425: - I'd like to see him as well. - As you wish, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.428: Strong for his age. He works hard.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.429: Show the Hand the helmet you made, lad.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.430: - This is fine work. - It's not for sale.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.431: Boy, this is the King's Hand!
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.432: - If his lordship wants the helmet... - I made it for me.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.433: - Forgive him, my lord. - There's nothing to forgive.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.434: When Lord Arryn came to visit you, what would you talk about?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.435: He just asked me questions is all, my lord.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.438: if I was being treated well, if I liked it here.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.439: But then he started asking me about my mother.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.44: If you like Redheads, ask for Ros.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.440: - Your mother? - Who she was, what she looked like.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.442: She died when I was little.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.447: If the day ever comes when that boy would rather wield a sword than forge one,
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.45: Come to see me off, Greyjoy? Kind of you.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.452: This is for the king from Lord Stark.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.456: How many do you think are in there with him? Huh?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.459: He likes to do this when I'm on duty.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.46: Your master doesn't seem to like Lannisters.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.460: He makes me listen as he insults my sister.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.461: - Forgive me, my lord... - Why do I have to forgive you?
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.463: - We've met before, you know. - Have we? Strange, I've forgotten.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.464: The siege of Pyke. We fought side by side one afternoon.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.466: - That's where you got your scar? - Aye.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.467: - Oh. - One of the Greyjoys nearly took my eye.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.468: - Vicious sons of whores. - They like their bloodshed.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.469: They stopped liking it at the end.
Game Of Thrones S01E04 Cripples, Bastard.47: - He's not my master. - No, of course not.

Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.352: Too many words. A witch's words poison the ears.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.354: his wound must be washed and sewn or it will fester.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.355: Let her clean your wound, my sun and stars...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.356: ...it makes me hurt to see you bleed.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.357: For 30 years I've been making corpses out of men, boy.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.358: I'm the man you want leading the vanguard.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.359: Galbart Glover will lead the van.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.36: Kill the Braavosi. Bring the girl.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.361: before an Umber marches behind a Glover.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.362: I will lead the van or I will take my men
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.364: You are welcome to do so, Lord Umber.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.365: And when I am done with the Lannisters,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.366: I will march back north, root you out of your keep
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.367: and hang you for an oathbreaker.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.369: I'll not sit here and swallow insults from a boy so green he pisses grass.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.37: Arya child, we are done with dancing for the day.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.370: My lord father taught me it was death to bare steel
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.372: But doubtless the Greatjon only meant to cut my meat for me.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.375: - What is it? What's happened? - Shh, it's all right.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.376: - Where are you going? - South. For Father.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.377: - But it's the middle of the night. - The Lannisters have spies everywhere.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.378: I don't want them to know we're coming.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.379: - They have more men than we do. - Aye, they do.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.380: Can't I come with you? I can ride now.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.381: You've seen me riding. And I won't get in the way, I...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.382: There must always be a Stark at Winterfell.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.383: Until I return that will be you.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.384: You are not to leave the castle walls while we are gone. Do you understand?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.385: Listen to Maester Luwin. Look after your little brother.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.386: - I will. - I'll send letters whenever I can,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.387: but if you don't hear from me, don't be scared.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.389: How long have you been hiding out there?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.390: Robb will be looking for you to say goodbye.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.391: - They've all gone away. - They'll be back soon.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.392: Robb will free Father and they'll come back with Mother.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.395: And watch over all the other men from Winterfell.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.398: The old gods are answering you.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.399: - What are you doing here? - They're my gods too.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.40: - Begone now, Arya. - Come with me. Run.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.400: Beyond the Wall, they're the only gods.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.401: - Even slaves are allowed to pray. - You're not a slave.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.402: Well, your friend did put a knife to my throat.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.405: What did you mean about hearing the gods?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.406: You asked them, they're answering you.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.41: The first sword of Braavos does not run.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.410: Who do you think sends the wind if not the gods?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.413: Your brother will get no help from them where he's going.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.414: The old gods have no power in the South.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.415: The weirwoods there were all cut down a long time ago.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.416: How can they watch when they have no eyes?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.418: He has giants' blood in him or I'm the queen.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.419: Go back and find your clothes, Hodor.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.421: Are there really giants beyond the wall?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.423: I tried telling your brother, he's marching the wrong way.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.424: All these swords, they should be going north, boy.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.427: They were touched by white walkers.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.429: That's why their eyes turned blue.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.431: - How do you know that? - I read about it in a book...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.432: a very old book in Maester Aemon's library.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.433: - What else did the book say? - The white walkers
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.434: sleep beneath the ice for thousands of years.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.436: And when they wake up, what?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.437: I hope the Wall's high enough.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.439: Robb's brought the North with him.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.440: The river lords are falling back with Jaime Lannister at their heels.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.441: And Lord Tywin is bringing around a second Lannister army from the South.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.442: Our scouts confirm it's even larger than the Kingslayer's.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.443: One army or two, the kings in the North
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.444: threw back hosts 10 times as large.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.447: Lady Catelyn, you're a welcome sight in these troubled times.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.448: We had thought not to meet you here, my lady.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.449: I had not thought to be here.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.450: I would speak with my son alone.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.451: I know you will forgive me, my lords.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.452: You heard her! Move your arses!
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.454: You too, Greyjoy. Are you bloody deaf?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.456: We'll shove our swords up Tywin Lannister's bunghole
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.457: and then it's on to the Red Keep to free Ned.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.459: You're not wasting away, are you?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.460: I remember the day you came into this world,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.462: And now I find you leading a host to war.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.463: - There was no one else. - No one?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.464: Who were those men I saw here?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.465: - None of them are Starks. - All of them are seasoned in battle.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.466: If you think you can send me back to Winterfell...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.47: Stay away from me. I'll tell my father.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.472: - There's no mention of Arya. - No.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.473: How many men do you have?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.475: If I go to King's Landing and bend my knee to Joffrey...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.476: You would never be allowed to leave. No.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.477: Our best hope, our only hope,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.478: - is that you can defeat them in the field. - And if I lose?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.479: Do you know what happened to the Targaryen children
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.480: - when the Mad King fell? - They were butchered in their sleep.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.481: On the orders of Tywin Lannister.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.482: And the years have not made him kinder.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.484: your father dies, your sisters die,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.486: Well, that makes it simple, then.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.488: From here it might be best if Bronn and I continue alone.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.489: Best for Tyrion, son of Tywin.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.49: Who do you think sent me?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.492: Shagga, son of Dolf, will cut off his manhood...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.493: And feed it to the goats, yes.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.498: The rumours of your demise were unfounded.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.5: Your sister knew perfectly well we were to leave today.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.502: This is Shagga, son of Dolf,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.504: Timett, son of Timett, ruler of the Burned Men.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.505: This fair maid is Chella, daughter of Cheyk,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.507: And here we have Bronn, son of...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.509: May I present my lord father,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.510: Tywin, son of Tytos of House Lannister,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.511: Lord of Casterly Rock and Warden of the West?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.512: Kind of you to go to war for me.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.514: The honour of the house was at stake.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.515: Your brother would never have submitted to capture so meekly.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.516: We have our differences, Jaime and I.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.518: He's been covering himself in glory.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.519: Jaime smashed the river lords at the Golden Tooth,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.52: - What do you want? - I want you, wolf girl.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.520: and now lays siege to Riverrun, Catelyn Stark's homeland.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.521: - And the Starks? Lord Eddard? - Is our hostage.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.522: He will lead no armies from his dungeon cell.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.523: How did my sweet sister persuade the king to imprison his dear friend Ned?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.524: Robert Baratheon is dead. Joffrey rules in King's Landing.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.526: Stark's son has called his banners.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.527: - He moves south with a strong host. - A green boy.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.528: One taste of battle and he'll run back to Winterfell with his tail between his legs.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.529: Maybe. Though the boy does have a certain belligerence.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.531: While we're on the subject of war,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.532: I made promises to my friends here,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.533: and a Lannister always pays his debts.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.534: We shall require 3,000 helms and shields,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.537: If it please my lord, Ser Addam bids me report
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.538: that the northmen have crossed the Neck.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.539: The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws. So be it.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.54: - My father's a lord. He'll reward you. - She'll reward me - the queen!
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.540: Kevan, command the drummers beat assembly.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.541: And send word to Jaime that I am moving against Robb Stark.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.543: It is said that the men of the mountain clans are great warriors.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.544: Ride with me against my enemies
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.545: and you shall have all my son promised you and more.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.546: Only if the halfman fights with us.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.547: Until we hold the steel he pledged us,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.548: the little lion's life is ours.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.549: The scouts report Lord Tywin moves north.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.550: We need to get him on broken ground, put his knights at a disadvantage.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.551: No, we need to get around him and break Jaime Lannister's siege of Riverrun.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.552: Do that and the river lords will join us.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.553: To do either we need to cross the river and the only crossing is at the Twins.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.554: Lord Frey controls that bridge. Your father's bannerman.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.555: "The late Lord Frey" my father calls him.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.556: At the Trident, he didn't appear until the battle was done.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.557: Some men take their oaths more seriously than others.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.558: Robb's right. We need that bridge.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.559: So what's it going to be?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.56: Lord Stark, you must be thirsty.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.560: Do we move against Jaime or Lord Tywin?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.561: Your pardon, my lords. We've captured a Lannister scout.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.562: Don't worry, lad. He won't be leaving this tent with his head.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.563: - Where did you find him? - In the brush above the encampment.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.567: You don't have to do this yourself. Your father would understand...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.568: My father understands mercy, when there is room for it.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.573: Tell Lord Tywin winter is coming for him.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.574: 20,000 northerners marching south to find out if he really does shit gold.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.577: Are you touched, boy?! Letting him go?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.58: I promise you it isn't poisoned.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.581: It is also the wish of His Grace
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.582: that his loyal servant Janos Slynt,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.583: - Commander of the City Watch... - Ser Aron.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.584: ...be at once raised to the rank of lord...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.586: ...and granted the ancient seat of Harrenhal,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.587: and that his sons and grandsons shall hold this honour
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.588: after him until the end of time.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.589: In the place of the traitor Eddard Stark,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.59: Why is it no one ever trusts the eunuch?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.590: it is the wish of His Grace that Tywin Lannister,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.591: Lord of Casterly Rock and Warden of the West,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.592: be appointed Hand of the King.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.594: in these times of treason and turmoil,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.595: it is the view of council
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.6: - How she could forget... - She didn't forget.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.600: Your Grace, I am yours to command.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.603: You have served the realm long and faithfully.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.604: Every man and woman in the Seven Kingdoms owes you thanks.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.605: But it is time to put aside your armour and your sword.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.606: It is time to rest and look back with pride
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.607: on your many years of service.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.608: Your Grace, the Kingsguard is a sworn brotherhood.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.609: Our vows are taken for life. Only death relieves us of our sacred trust.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.61: I would save the rest, if I were you.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.610: Whose death, Ser Barristan? Yours or your king's?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.612: You're too old to protect anybody.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.613: - Your Grace... - The council has determined
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.614: that Ser Jaime Lannister will take your place
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.615: - as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard. - The man who profaned his blade
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.616: with the blood of the king he had sworn to defend!
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.618: We have nothing but gratitude for your long service, good ser.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.619: You shall be given a stout keep beside the sea,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.62: Hide it. Men have been known to die of thirst in these cells.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.620: with servants to look after your every need.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.621: A hall to die in and men to bury me.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.625: Even now I could cut through the five of you like carving a cake!
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.627: Melt it down and add it to the others.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.628: If any man in this hall has other matters
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.629: to set before His Grace, let him speak now
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.630: or go forth and hold his silence.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.633: The Lady Sansa of House Stark.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.634: Do you have some business for the king and the council, Sansa?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.636: As it please Your Grace, I ask mercy for my father,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.637: Lord Eddard Stark, who was Hand of the King.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.639: - It should be torn out, root... - Let her speak.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.64: The younger one seems to have escaped the castle.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.640: I want to hear what she says.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.642: Do you deny your father's crime?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.643: No, my lords. I know he must be punished.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.645: I know my lord father must regret what he did.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.646: He was King Robert's friend and he loved him.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.647: You all know he loved him.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.648: He never wanted to be Hand until the king asked him.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.649: They must have lied to him - Lord Renly or Lord Stannis or somebody.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.65: Even my little birds cannot find her.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.651: He said I wasn't the king.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.652: - Why did he say that? - He was badly hurt.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.653: Maester Pycelle was giving him milk of the poppy.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.654: He wasn't himself. Otherwise he never would have said it.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.657: And yet they say wisdom oft comes from the mouths of babes.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.66: - And Sansa? - Still engaged to Joffrey.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.660: If you still have any affection in your heart for me,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.661: please do me this kindness, Your Grace.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.662: Your sweet words have moved me.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.663: But your father has to confess.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.664: He has to confess and say that I'm the king...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.665: or there'll be no mercy for him.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.67: Cersei will keep her close. The rest of your household though...
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.68: all dead, it grieves me to say. I do so hate the sight of blood.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.69: You watched my men being slaughtered and did nothing.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.7: She's with her dancing master. She's with him every morning.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.71: I was unarmed, unarmoured and surrounded by Lannister swords.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.72: When you look at me do you see a hero?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.73: What madness led you to tell the queen
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.74: you had learned the truth about Joffrey's birth?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.76: - That she might save her children. - Ah, the children.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.77: It's always the innocents who suffer.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.78: It wasn't the wine that killed Robert, nor the boar.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.79: The wine slowed him down and the boar ripped him open,
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.8: She always comes back with scrapes and bruises. She's so clumsy.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.80: but it was your mercy that killed the king.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.81: I trust you know you're a dead man, Lord Eddard?
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.82: The queen can't kill me. Cat holds her brother.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.83: The wrong brother, sadly. And lost to her.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.84: Your wife has let the Imp slip through her fingers.
Game Of Thrones S01E08 The Pointy End.sr.86: then slit my throat and be done with it.

Game Of Thrones S01E09 Baelor.srt.510: so while Jaime hunted down the rapers I took her to the nearest inn and fed her.
Game Of Thrones S01E09 Baelor.srt.514: Together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine.
Game Of Thrones S01E09 Baelor.srt.515: Impossible as it seems, there was a time when I was unaccustomed to wine.

Game Of Thrones S01E09 Baelor.srt.529: and there you have it - man and wife.
